--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Wildrider smiled broadly at the words of the two new recruits.  
"Then,
> we will conquer this miserable dust ball and then....." Megatron 
stopped
> his ranting, and noticed them. "Ahhh yes, the Decepticon distress
> signal." he moved forward, and pushed Wildrider and Drag-Strip out 
of
> the way. Megatron put his arm with the fusion cannon to his chest to
> announce himself. "I am Megatron. Leader of the Decepticons." He 
looked
> down at them, for their response.


::Domnijoe and Blindchaos::

    Blindchaos completely disregarded the 'no-smirk' demands Domnijoe 
implemented on him. He gave Megatron the biggest, brightest (and to 
Domnijoe, the most disgustingly sweet) smile he could muster. The
grin 
held the charm of a young puppy who would do anything ordered of him.
    "Name's Blindchaos." he said, staring up. "I specialize in
torture 
and interrogation." He threw his thumb over his shoulder, pointing
out 
Domnijoe. "She's told me much about you." His smile became more 
candied, but it held a hint of what he was truely capable of. "I am 
honored to serve you." he said and stepped backward, letting his 
female companion speak.
    The Decepticon femme's look was dirty when she looked at 
Blindchaos, but became respectful when she looked up at Megatron.
    "Hello again, Lord Megatron." she said. "Long time no see." She 
saluted. Her gaze was unafraid, bold but leery of someone with 
Megatrons strength and reputation. "Domnijoe at your command." she 
said. "I served under you before your disappearance on Earth. This is 
the first time we have spoken. I would be honored to serve you again."
    Blindchaos chuckled.
    "She's a kick tale pipe and take names gal." he said. "But she's 
got good aim and eager in battle." His smile faded some. "Although
I'm 
not much good in a fight, I can make prisoners sing like a bird."  
Domnijoe saw Blindchaos' grin become sadistic, the first time since 
she met him. Pushing the image from her mind, she eagerly looked at 
Megatron for her first orders.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions

******************
